prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a strong shell and oversized cannons on its back.
Imagine a Pokemon that can shoot powerful water blasts with its massive shoulders.
Show me a bulky Pokemon built for both defense and offense with aquatic features.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in aquatic environments and has a calm demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that evolves from a small turtle into a large water master.
Make a creature that embodies strength and resilience, with a blue and beige color scheme.
Give me a Pokemon that is a great swimmer, with a sturdy body and big eyes.

distinctive_features: Three water cannons on the back

semantic_attributes.combat_style: Defensive and offensive using water attacks
